{"data": {"production":{"id":"lost_in_translation","production_title":"Lost in Translation","production_status":3,"production_desc":"

Bob Harris (Bill Murray<\/a>) and Charlotte (Scarlett Johansson<\/a>) are two Americans in Tokyo.<\/p>

Bob is a movie star in town to shoot a whiskey commercial, while Charlotte is a young woman tagging along with her workaholic photographer husband (Giovanni Ribisi<\/a>).<\/p>

Unable to sleep, Bob and Charlotte cross paths one night in the luxury hotel bar. This chance meeting soon becomes a surprising friendship. Charlotte and Bob venture through Tokyo, having often hilarious encounters with its citizens, and ultimately discover a new belief in life's possibilities.<\/p>

Shot entirely on location in Japan, Sofia Coppola's<\/a> Lost in Translation<\/em><\/strong> is a valentine to the nature of close friendships and to the city of Tokyo. Ms. Coppola's film, from her original screenplay, contemplates the unexpected connections we make that might not last - yet stay with us forever.<\/p>","in_theaters":"

Quentin Tarantino - \"...crush...\"<\/p>","short_desc":"","description":"

This is a crush movie. And somewhere around halfway through watching it, I got an incredible crush on the actual movie – every time I've seen it since, I've had a little date with myself.<\/p>","is_featured":0,"is_trailer":0,"external_url":"","columns":1,"max_width":0,"thumb":"","related_items":[],"tags":"","quote_author":"QUENTIN TARANTINO","quote_source":"","rating":"","rating_max":4,"loop_vid":0,"img":"","video":""},{"id":"657","aid":657,"content_type":"quote","title":"

Roger Ebert - \"...certainly one of the year's best movies.\"<\/p>","short_desc":"","description":"

This is certainly one of the year's best movies. One thing I especially admired was the way Bill Murray dials down his gift for comedy, and finds just the right tired and subdued note. Any comedian can be really funny, but it takes a certain genius to be just a little funny kind of quietly funny, kind of wearily funny. <\/p>","is_featured":0,"is_trailer":0,"external_url":"","columns":1,"max_width":0,"thumb":"","related_items":[],"tags":"","quote_author":"ROGER EBERT","quote_source":"","rating":"","rating_max":4,"loop_vid":0,"img":"","video":""},{"id":"gallery_unit_6","aid":643,"content_type":"image","title":"","short_desc":"","description":"","is_featured":0,"is_trailer":0,"external_url":"","columns":2,"max_width":1784,"thumb":"http:\/\/focusmicrosites.s3.amazonaws.com\/assets\/uploads\/_tmp\/1484290198_focus_lostintranslation_sofiacoppola_billmurray_scarletjohansson_giavaniribisi_annafaris_gallery9-796x529.jpg","related_items":[],"tags":"","loop_vid":0,"img":"http:\/\/focusmicrosites.s3.amazonaws.com\/assets\/uploads\/1484290198_focus_lostintranslation_sofiacoppola_billmurray_scarletjohansson_giavaniribisi_annafaris_gallery9.jpg","video":""},{"id":"658","aid":658,"content_type":"quote","title":"

Joel Siegel - \"She has all the chops...\"<\/p>","short_desc":"","description":"

This is the director's film. She has all the chops, what a haunting movie, great performances, great eye for detail.<\/p>","is_featured":0,"is_trailer":0,"external_url":"","columns":1,"max_width":0,"thumb":"","related_items":[],"tags":"","quote_author":"JOEL SIEGEL","quote_source":"GOOD MORNING AMERICA","rating":"","rating_max":4,"loop_vid":0,"img":"","video":""},{"id":"659","aid":659,"content_type":"quote","title":"

Christy Lemire - \"...best performances of his career...\"<\/p>","short_desc":"","description":"

Sofia Coppola's second film establishes her as a director with an assured, unique vision. She draws from Bill Murray one of the best performances of his career; he's heartbreaking as an aging actor stuck doing whiskey ads in Tokyo. Scarlett Johansson continues to prove she's an actress with maturity and wisdom beyond her years.<\/p>","is_featured":0,"is_trailer":0,"external_url":"","columns":1,"max_width":0,"thumb":"","related_items":[],"tags":"","quote_author":"CHRISTY LEMIRE","quote_source":"AP","rating":"","rating_max":4,"loop_vid":0,"img":"","video":""},{"id":"gallery_unit_4","aid":641,"content_type":"image","title":"","short_desc":"","description":"","is_featured":0,"is_trailer":0,"external_url":"","columns":1,"max_width":1201,"thumb":"http:\/\/focusmicrosites.s3.amazonaws.com\/assets\/uploads\/_tmp\/1484290158_focus_lostintranslation_sofiacoppola_billmurray_scarletjohansson_giavaniribisi_annafaris_gallery5-398x262.jpg","related_items":[],"tags":"","loop_vid":0,"img":"http:\/\/focusmicrosites.s3.amazonaws.com\/assets\/uploads\/1484290158_focus_lostintranslation_sofiacoppola_billmurray_scarletjohansson_giavaniribisi_annafaris_gallery5.jpg","video":""},{"id":"gallery_unit_11","aid":648,"content_type":"image","title":"","short_desc":"","description":"","is_featured":0,"is_trailer":0,"external_url":"","columns":3,"max_width":1201,"thumb":"http:\/\/focusmicrosites.s3.amazonaws.com\/assets\/uploads\/_tmp\/1484290293_focus_lostintranslation_sofiacoppola_billmurray_scarletjohansson_giavaniribisi_annafaris_gallery15-1194x649.jpg","related_items":[],"tags":"","loop_vid":0,"img":"http:\/\/focusmicrosites.s3.amazonaws.com\/assets\/uploads\/1484290293_focus_lostintranslation_sofiacoppola_billmurray_scarletjohansson_giavaniribisi_annafaris_gallery15.jpg","video":""},{"id":"660","aid":660,"content_type":"quote","title":"

Karen Durbin - \"A smart, terrific new comedy...\"<\/p>","short_desc":"","description":"

A smart, terrific new comedy with a surprisingly urgent emotional core! Delicate and electrifying! Chief among the pleasures is a great, understated performance by Bill Murray.<\/p>","is_featured":0,"is_trailer":0,"external_url":"","columns":1,"max_width":0,"thumb":"","related_items":[],"tags":"","quote_author":"KAREN DURBIN","quote_source":"ELLE","rating":"","rating_max":4,"loop_vid":0,"img":"","video":""},{"id":"gallery_unit_10","aid":647,"content_type":"image","title":"","short_desc":"","description":"","is_featured":0,"is_trailer":0,"external_url":"","columns":3,"max_width":1201,"thumb":"http:\/\/focusmicrosites.s3.amazonaws.com\/assets\/uploads\/_tmp\/1484290276_focus_lostintranslation_sofiacoppola_billmurray_scarletjohansson_giavaniribisi_annafaris_gallery14-1194x788.jpg","related_items":[],"tags":"","loop_vid":0,"img":"http:\/\/focusmicrosites.s3.amazonaws.com\/assets\/uploads\/1484290276_focus_lostintranslation_sofiacoppola_billmurray_scarletjohansson_giavaniribisi_annafaris_gallery14.jpg","video":""},{"id":"663","aid":663,"content_type":"quote","title":"

John Anderson - \"...sophisticated and knowing...\"<\/p>","short_desc":"","description":"

That someone as young as writer-director Sofia Coppola could produce something as sophisticated and knowing as Lost in Translation was almost as baffling as Bill Murray's performance. As a combination of Buster Keaton and John Gielgud, Murray made us realize, even as the movie was unspooling, what a strange, lofty place he holds in the collective consciousness of movie-going America.<\/p>","is_featured":0,"is_trailer":0,"external_url":"","columns":1,"max_width":0,"thumb":"","related_items":[],"tags":"","quote_author":"JOHN Peter Rainier - \"Bill Murray has become...\"<\/p>","short_desc":"","description":"

Bill Murray has become an actor of extraordinary range. <\/p>","is_featured":0,"is_trailer":0,"external_url":"","columns":1,"max_width":0,"thumb":"","related_items":[],"tags":"","quote_author":"PETER RAINIER","quote_source":"NEW YORK","rating":"","rating_max":4,"loop_vid":0,"img":"","video":""},{"id":"gallery_unit_9","aid":646,"content_type":"image","title":"","short_desc":"","description":"","is_featured":0,"is_trailer":0,"external_url":"","columns":3,"max_width":1201,"thumb":"http:\/\/focusmicrosites.s3.amazonaws.com\/assets\/uploads\/_tmp\/1484290256_focus_lostintranslation_sofiacoppola_billmurray_scarletjohansson_giavaniribisi_annafaris_gallery13-1194x646.jpg","related_items":[],"tags":"","loop_vid":0,"img":"http:\/\/focusmicrosites.s3.amazonaws.com\/assets\/uploads\/1484290256_focus_lostintranslation_sofiacoppola_billmurray_scarletjohansson_giavaniribisi_annafaris_gallery13.jpg","video":""},{"id":"664","aid":664,"content_type":"quote","title":"

Joe Morganstern - \"...gives the best performance...\"<\/p>","short_desc":"","description":"

Little (else) about this beautiful movie is standard, let alone predictable. Ms. Johansson makes acting look easy. Her instincts are sure and her spirit is sweet in this lovely portrait of a young woman whose vivid passion and intelligence have had nowhere to light. As for Mr. Murray, he gives the best performance of his career, but that doesn't begin to describe the mysterious grace or complexity of the tragicomic character he creates.<\/p>","is_featured":0,"is_trailer":0,"external_url":"","columns":1,"max_width":0,"thumb":"","related_items":[],"tags":"","quote_author":"JOE MORGENSTERN","quote_source":"THE WALL STREET n":"","is_featured":0,"is_trailer":0,"external_url":"","columns":1,"max_width":1201,"thumb":"http:\/\/focusmicrosites.s3.amazonaws.com\/assets\/uploads\/_tmp\/1484290375_focus_lostintranslation_sofiacoppola_billmurray_scarletjohansson_giavaniribisi_annafaris_gallery7-398x594.jpg","related_items":[],"tags":"","loop_vid":0,"img":"http:\/\/focusmicrosites.s3.amazonaws.com\/assets\/uploads\/1484290375_focus_lostintranslation_sofiacoppola_billmurray_scarletjohansson_giavaniribisi_annafaris_gallery7.jpg","video":""},{"id":"662","aid":662,"content_type":"quote","title":"

A.O. Scott - \"...ravishing...\"<\/p>","short_desc":"","description":"

Sofia Coppola's ravishing Lost in Translation<\/em>. Charlotte…played, with heart-melting moodiness, by Scarlett Johansson. Mr. Murray's subtle, aching, witty performance in Lost in Translation<\/em>, which opened on Friday, is certainly a revelation – and murmurs about an Oscar nomination have already begun. But it is hardly the first in his long and varied career. Wow, you think, this guy is an amazing actor, but such expressions of amazement have been bubbling up, with increasing frequency, for 20 years.<\/p>","is_featured":0,"is_trailer":0,"external_url":"","columns":1,"max_width":0,"thumb":"","related_items":[],"tags":"","quote_author":"A.O. SCOTT","quote_source":"THE NEW YORK TIMES","rating":"","rating_max":4,"loop_vid":0,"img":"","video":""},{"id":"gallery_bts_3","aid":653,"content_type":"image","title":"","short_desc":"","description":"","is_featured":0,"is_trailer":0,"external_url":"","columns":3,"max_width":1201,"thumb":"http:\/\/focusmicrosites.s3.amazonaws.com\/assets\/uploads\/_tmp\/1484290396_focus_lostintranslation_sofiacoppola_billmurray_scarletjohansson_giavaniribisi_annafaris_gallery8-1194x809.jpg","related_items":[],"tags":"","loop_vid":0,"img":"http:\/\/focusmicrosites.s3.amazonaws.com\/assets\/uploads\/1484290396_focus_lostintranslation_sofiacoppola_billmurray_scarletjohansson_giavaniribisi_annafaris_gallery8.jpg","video":""},{"id":"665","aid":665,"content_type":"quote","title":"

Bruce Handy - \"...may well be the best movie of the year...\"<\/p>","short_desc":"","description":"

Lost in Translation<\/em>, which she (Sofia Coppola) wrote and directed, may well be the best movie of the year. Few other filmmakers have as deft a way with atmosphere or as clear a notion of how it can be used to enrich a story. No other filmmaker has as piercing a sense of youthful despair.<\/p>","is_featured":0,"is_trailer":0,"external_url":"","columns":1,"max_width":0,"thumb":"","related_items":[],"tags":"","quote_author":"BRUCE HANDY","quote_source":"VANITY
